title: FIrefox Zoom meeting issues
content:
Recently I have issues in Zoom meetings. To make browsing a bit more private I went and activated some of the settings from privacytools.io, but I can't remember changing privacy settings before the problems started occuring. On the Firefox Beta channel I don't see any video streams (not even my own) and on the nightly channel I hear others audio speed up and they sound like mice and they here me extemely slow.

Does anyone else have these issues or an idea which settings might cause this?
creator: yvesvrancken

title: SELECCIONAR CERTIFICADO DIGITAL
content:
¡HOLA!, NECESITO AYUDA, POR FAVOR.

TENGO DOS CERTIFICADOS DIGITALES INSTALADOS. SIEMPRE ME SALE POR DEFECTO EL MISMO CERTIFICADO DIGITAL. TENGO SELECCIONADA LA OPCIÓN DE PREGUNTAR CADA VEZ, PERO ANTERIORMENTE, NO SÉ POR QUÉ, ESTABA SELECCIONADA LA OPCIÓN DE ELEGIR UNO. LA DESACTIVÉ, HE REINICIADO FIREFOX CON LOS COMPONENTES DESACTIVADOS Y MISTERIOSAMENTE AUN HABIENDO QUITADOS LOS CERTIFICADOS DE FIREFOX Y HABIÉNDOLOS IMPORTADO DE NUEVO, ENTRO EN UNA WEB OFICIAL Y LO PRIMERO QUE APARECE ES EL MISMO CERTIFICADO POR DEFECTO. Y SIN ESTAR SIQUIERA IMPORTADOS LOS CERTIFICADOS, ENTRO EN UNA WEB Y APARECE LA VENTANA CON EL CERTIFICADO POR DEFECTO.

HE PEDIDO AYUDA A LA FÁBRICA DE MONEDA Y TIMBRE Y ME DICE QUE ES UN PROBLEMA DE FIREFOX, QUE SE HA QUEDADO PILLADO ESA OPCIÓN EN ALGÚN SITIO.

POR FAVOR, NECESITO AYUDA. ANTERIORMENTE FUNCIONABA PERFECTAMENTE Y ME DEJABA SELECCIONAR CERTIFICADO.

MUCHAS GRACIAS POR VUESTRO TIEMPO.

ISABELNAVARRO.
creator: sabelluna

title: adding senders to safe list in outlook
content: I had some e-mails sent to junk by mistake but when I click "it's not junk" then open the e-mail and click on "add to safe senders list" this command is ignored as the next time I receive an e-mail from that sender it is again sent to junk. Microsoft tell me it's a browser (i.e. Firefox) issue. Can anyone please help ?

title: Overwriting "src" attribute with css "content" does not work
content:
Hello,

Seems there is some difference between Firefox and other browsers.

If you want to overwritethe src of an image, you can use "content" from css. In my case this is used for customerspecific styling, being done via CSS only, while the default image is provided directly over src attribute inside html.

https://jsfiddle.net/atXoR/qn4he25v/

This Problem appears in Firefox for Windows and Firefox for Android This Problem doesnt appear for Chromium', Firefox on IOs, Safari on IOs


Greetings, Stephan
creator: s.koerber93

title: Can't use Google Authenticator (Android) for Firefox Account's 2FA
content:
Hi,

As in the topic. When I scan the QR code with Google Authenticator, the account is added and new codes start spinning (labeled Firefox ($email)). However, when I enter the visible code into the Enter security code input, I get "Incorrect security code" error (tooltip).

I can see Google Authenticator listed as a supported application, is this no longer valid?

I also tried typing the secret key into the app directly with the same results.

Thanks for help in advance.
creator: robin92pl

title: While browsing I opened a tab expecting to see my rows of top sites, those I edited.
content:
While browsing I opened a tab so I could view my "Top Sites" and click on one of them I wanted to visit. They are all gone. There should be three rows, most of which I have edited to the sites I visit most. The option is still checked, with three rows being how many are shown. It is just a blank tab. Nothing is there anymore. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you.

Betty
creator: irrilia

title: Firefox manual accessibility focus concern with embedded YouTube video
content:
When using the Firefox browser to navigate the links on this page using the TAB key, https://www.utrgv.edu/police/ there is something that receives focus after the last link "FAQ" on the Departments section on the bottom left side when the focus enters the embedded YouTube video that is not announced using the NVDA screen reader or visible on the screen. A second TAB key press shows the animated subscribe button.

I'm using the latest version of Firefox (86.0) on Windows 10.

Chrome and other browsers show visible activity - animating the subscribe button - when using the TAB key to switch focus from the FAQ link to the embedded video.

Thanks, Russell
creator: russell.dove

title: Ultima actualizacion 86.0 Consume el 99% de RAM
content: Anteriormente ya habia pasado, creo que en la actualizacion 84.2 pero lo solucionaron en la actualizacion siguiente. Firefoz consume el 99%-100% de la RAM del equipo progresivamente, hasta congelar el equipo forzando a apagarlo. La unica forma de solucionarlo es : iniciando en modo seguro Creando nuevo perfil o borando todos los datos (cosa que no quiero hacer para no perder el historial, marcadores y contraseñas) Ya habia redactado mas detalles, pero claro, lo tipico no se envia el reporte y tienes que volver a escribir todo. Solo espero puedan solucionar este problema por que es muy molesto estar en modo seguro
creator: scrat_juan

title: SHA256 checksum for Firefox downloads
content: In order to mitigate supply chain attacks it would be useful to have a checksum published so that we can verify the file has downloaded appropriately. This should be included within the release notes.

title: How do i access the HTML code for my old thimble project?
content:
Im trying to access the HTML code i created on thimble back in 2018 but apparently Thimble he shit down and moved to glitch.

How do i transfer/access this code? This link (https://glitch.happyfox.com/kb/article/7-how-do-i-move-my-project-from-thimble-to-glitch/) says to contact the mozilla support team and i looked for an email but this place was the only support page i found.
creator: kyalsimm

title: multiple instances of firefox, but should only be one..
content:
I discovered this issue this evening, no idea how long it's been going on. I opened Task Manager to see if a program was running (not firefox) . Firefox WAS open, and I had one window open in firefox.. BUT next to Firefox, was (7) so I expanded. It showed 7 instances. With only 2 programs open, (firefox and task Manager) the amount of memory it was using was surprising.. Using 64 bit version of Firefox, 86.0

I tried "ending task" on the instances that were using 0% CPU, but I was only able to close 2-3 before ALL of them closed. I would then reopen and it would be 6, 7, or 8 instances I tried 3 times. 

Can someone enlighten me as to why it is doing this?

Screenshot below
creator: irishangel61

Thank you.

I have also tried this in a private window, on Google Chrome and on my phone and the same thing happens.

title: VPN Service
content: Hi There, Before I could sign up to a website I was directed to install a VPN service and they prescribed me to get NORD VPN and I thought but why not using the VPN service that I already have which is Mozilla VPN. So I tried to lock on to the site but I just could not now what do I do. I already pay for Mozilla VPN and if I do have to get Nord then I will have to cancel my Mozilla VPN. Please could you advice me what to do.
creator: Thomashurter

title: Turning Off Safe Search
content: So I need to search up certain websites and etc. But it tells me this website is restricted and when i turn safe-search off it goes back on again. If you can i need a solution for this I need a more simple way.
creator: paxmc10

title: Poblem with cut and paste
content:
When I try to paste something into a comment, I get this:

"16.00 Normal 0 false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-priority:99; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin-top:0in; mso-para-margin-right:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:6.0pt; mso-para-margin-left:0in; line-height:115%; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:16.0pt; font-family:"Arial",sans-serif; mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi;}"

How can I stop this?
creator: bob.abbott
